Properties.ProtectedString:
--Rescripted by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
Animations = {}
ServerControl = Tool:WaitForChild("ServerControl") ClientControl = Tool:WaitForChild("ClientControl")
ClientControl.OnClientInvoke = (function(Mode, Value) if Mode == "PlayAnimation" then for i, v in pairs(Animations) do if v.Animation == Value then v.AnimationTrack:Stop() table.remove(Animations, i) end end local AnimationTrack = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Value.Animation) table.insert(Animations, {Animation = Value.Animation, AnimationTrack = AnimationTrack}) AnimationTrack:Play(nil, nil, Value.Speed) end end)
function InvokeServer(Mode, Value) pcall(function() ServerControl:InvokeServer(Mode, Value) end) end
function CheckIfAlive() return (Player and Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent and Humanoid.Health > 0 and Torso and Torso.Parent) end
function Equipped(Mouse) Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") Torso = Character:FindFirstChild("Torso") if not CheckIfAlive() then return end Mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() InvokeServer("MouseClick", {Down = true}) end) Mouse.KeyDown:connect(function(Key) InvokeServer("KeyPress", {Key = Key, Down = true, Position = Mouse.Hit.p}) end) end
function Unequipped() for i, v in pairs(Animations) do if v and v.AnimationTrack then v.AnimationTrack:Stop() end end Animations = {} end
Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)

--Rescripted by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
Damage = { ThrowDamage = 16, HitDamage = 22 }
Animations = { Tool:WaitForChild("Slash"), Tool:WaitForChild("SlashV2") }
MaxDistance = 45
AwayFromCharacter = false
BladeThrowable = true
Equipped = false
ServerControl = (Tool:FindFirstChild("ServerControl") or Instance.new("RemoteFunction")) ServerControl.Name = "ServerControl" ServerControl.Parent = Tool
ClientControl = (Tool:FindFirstChild("ClientControl") or Instance.new("RemoteFunction")) ClientControl.Name = "ClientControl" ClientControl.Parent = Tool
ServerControl.OnServerInvoke = (function(player, Mode, Value) if Mode == "MouseClick" and Value.Down then Click() elseif Mode == "KeyPress" and Value.Key == "q" and Value.Down then ThrowBlade(Value.Position) end end)
Handle.Transparency = 0 Tool.Enabled = true
function InvokeClient(Mode, Value) pcall(function() ClientControl:InvokeClient(Player, Mode, Value) end) end
function TagHumanoid(humanoid, player) local Creator_Tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") Creator_Tag.Name = "creator" Creator_Tag.Value = player Debris:AddItem(Creator_Tag, 2) Creator_Tag.Parent = humanoid end
function UntagHumanoid(humanoid) for i, v in pairs(humanoid:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("ObjectValue") and v.Name == "creator" then v:Destroy() end end end
function Click() if not Tool.Enabled then return end Tool.Enabled = false local Animation = Animations[math.random(1, #Animations)] InvokeClient("PlayAnimation", {Animation = Animation, Speed = 1}) wait(1.25) Tool.Enabled = true end
function ThrowBlade(TargetPos) if not Tool.Enabled then return end if BladeThrowable and CheckIfAlive() then Handle.Transparency = 1 local CloneBlade = Handle:Clone() CloneBlade.Name = "Blade" CloneBlade.Transparency = 0 local Direction = (TargetPos - Handle.Position).unit Spawn(function() Throw(CloneBlade, Direction) end) Tool.Enabled = false wait(5) Handle.Transparency = 0 BladeThrowable = true Tool.Enabled = true end end
function Blow(Hit, damage) if not Hit or not Hit.Parent then return end local humanoid = Hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid and humanoid ~= Humanoid and humanoid.Health > 0 and Humanoid.Health > 0 then UntagHumanoid(humanoid) TagHumanoid(humanoid, Player) humanoid:TakeDamage(damage) AwayFromCharacter = false end end
function ReturnToCharacter(CloneBlade) if CloneBlade and CheckIfAlive() then local Distance = (CloneBlade.Position - Torso.Position).magnitude local LookAt = (Torso.Position - CloneBlade.Position).unit while Distance > 4 and CloneBlade do CloneBlade.Velocity = LookAt * 45 if CloneBlade then LookAt = (Torso.Position - CloneBlade.Position).unit Distance = (Torso.Position - CloneBlade.Position).magnitude end wait() end if CloneBlade and CloneBlade.Parent then CloneBlade:Destroy() end wait(0.25) end end
function Throw(CloneBlade, Direction) local SpawnPos = Handle.Position + Direction * 4 CloneBlade.CFrame = CFrame.new(SpawnPos, (SpawnPos + Direction)) * CFrame.Angles((math.pi / 2), 0, 0) CloneBlade.CanCollide = false
CloneBlade.Velocity = (Direction * 45) CloneBlade.RotVelocity = Vector3.new(0, 40, 0)
local FloatForce = Instance.new("BodyForce") FloatForce.force = Vector3.new(0, (CloneBlade:GetMass() * 196.20), 0) FloatForce.Parent = CloneBlade
Debris:AddItem(CloneBlade, 10) CloneBlade.Parent = game:GetService("Workspace")
CloneBlade.Touched:connect(function(Hit) Blow(Hit, Damage.ThrowDamage) end)
AwayFromCharacter = true
local Distance = (CloneBlade.Position - SpawnPos).magnitude while AwayFromCharacter and Distance < MaxDistance do Distance = (CloneBlade.Position - SpawnPos).magnitude wait(0.25) end AwayFromCharacter = false ReturnToCharacter(CloneBlade) end
function SpinBlade() Spawn(function() local Theta = (math.pi / 6) while Equipped do Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(math.cos(Theta), math.sin(Theta), 0) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(-math.sin(Theta), math.cos(Theta), 0) Theta = (Theta + (math.pi / 6)) wait() end Tool.Grip = CFrame.new(0, 0, 0, 0, 0, -1, 0, 1, 0, 1, -0, 0) end) end
function CheckIfAlive() return (Player and Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent and Humanoid.Health > 0 and Torso and Torso.Parent) end
function Equipped() Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") Torso = Character:FindFirstChild("Torso") if not CheckIfAlive() then return end Equipped = true SpinBlade() end
function Unequipped() Equipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)
Handle.Touched:connect(function(Hit) Blow(Hit, Damage.HitDamage) end)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Mouse_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunCursor.png" Reloading_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunWaitCursor.png"
Tool = script.Parent
Mouse = nil
function UpdateIcon() if Mouse then Mouse.Icon = Tool.Enabled and Mouse_Icon or Reloading_Icon end end
function OnEquipped(ToolMouse) Mouse = ToolMouse UpdateIcon() end
function OnChanged(Property) if Property == "Enabled" then UpdateIcon() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Changed:connect(OnChanged)
